title: Adventure Festival
description: Annual adventure sports festival with paragliding and rock climbing events.

title: Light Rain Expected
description: Light to moderate rainfall expected this weekend. Roads may be slippery.

title: Snow on High Passes
description: Heavy snow expected on Khardung La and Pangong passes. Check road conditions before travel.

title: Pushkar Camel Fair
description: Famous camel fair with cultural performances and traditional market.

title: Pleasant Monsoon Season
description: Beautiful lush greenery post-monsoon. Lesser crowds on beaches.

title: Misty Weather
description: Dense mist during mornings and evenings. Reduces visibility but creates magical photography opportunities.

title: Toy Train Schedule Limited
description: Heritage toy train operating on limited schedule due to annual maintenance.

title: Perfect Beach Season
description: Best time for beach activities and water sports. Clear skies and calm seas.
